alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:54PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central El Paso County through 830 PM MDT... At 754 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ellicott, or 27 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Yoder around 810 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rush. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
